title: (x) Urban Outfitters website - custom font by Jeremy Dean {Sean Glenn}
content: If it's from Urban Outfitters it's probably Jeremy Dean's hand lettering (some of them seem to have been converted to fonts). House Industries is also doing a Jeremy Dean Vs. House Industries set that is going to include a bunch of fonts in this style. There used to be an preview of the set on Jeremy's website ( [http://www.comfortablelead.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109095027/http:/www.comfortablelead.com/)) but it's gone now.
author: seanglenn
